commit message: Added menu for preferences, etc. & about dialog.
Renamed new menu & some typo fixes.
Added bare bone of 'Preferences' view.
Added GUI elements for preferences view.
Some layout fixes for the write tag options.

Preferences GUI is now fully implemented.

But until now the preferences will take no effect.
Added link to F-Droid store.
Added a enumeration for all preferences.
Refactored 'Pref' to 'Preference'.
Fixed wrong infos on the auto reconnect prefernece.
Implemented the auto reconnect preference.
Merge branch 'preferences'

Refactored <name>Activity --> <name>.

Refactored MainActivity --> MainMenu.
Refactored HelpActivity --> HelpAndInfo.
Added tools:context to all activity layout.
Changed 'menu_' strings to 'action_' strings.
Changed 'OK'-button to 'Save'-button in save dump dialog.
Added 'rate this app' button in about dialog.
Added link to changelog (about dialog).
Fixed odd typo.

Updated infos on the auto reconnect setting.

Antenna issues may also lead to the tag lost problem for
special tags (e.g. smartMX in MFC emulation mode).

Replaced hardcoded version code with a dynamic one (strings.xml).

Getting the version code (from AndroidManifest.xml) is now
a common method (Common.getVersionCode()).
Removed unnecessary launch mode settings from Android manifest.

Changed layout IDs to be more consistent.

Added layout ID to all GUI components.

Refactored 'CreateKeyMap' to 'KeyMapCreator'.

Now the activity names are more consistent.
Also fixed some small javadoc issues.
Show error message if tag gets lost during key mapping.

New Feature: Display the date of manufacture.

Because it is just a simple (small) feature, the second version
digit (0.X.0) will not be increased in the next release.
Added a section about the new feature (date of manuf.).
Bugfix: The week must be between 1 and 53 (date of manuf.)
Carified that the date of manuf. format is not a standard.

Bugfix: Added work around for styled resources with format strings.

See: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html

New release: 1.7.2

Updated changelog.
Updated todo.
Fixed documentation.
Fixed readme header (import into eclipse).
Increased version number.
